name: 高等資料庫
description:
​ ▲教學目標：
This course is aimed to introduce fundamentals of database systems, their architectures, design methodologies and recent research topics related to data base design.
goals: This course is aimed to introduce fundamentals of database systems,
Design methodologies and recent research topics related to data base design.
syllabus:
▲教學目標：  
This course is aimed to introduce fundamentals of database systems, their architectures, design methodologies and recent research topics related to data base design.  
▲教材內容：  
二、教材內容：  
Unit 1: database systems introduction  
Unit 2: ER-model  
Unit 3: Relational Model and Relational languages  
Unit 4: Normalization  
Unit 5: Relational algebra and Relational calculus  
Unt 6: SQL  
Unit 7: File Structure and Query Optimization  
Unit 8: Transaction Processing  
Unit 9: Concurrency Control Techniques  
Unit 10: Database Recovery  
▲教學評量：  
三、實施方式：  
Tentative Grading: 100 points = 20% quiz + 30% project +10% oral presentation on selected topics + 20% mid +20% final
